aboutText: Hi There! I'm a Front-End Web Developer motivated by finding creative and efficient ways to solve problems

aboutDescriptionOne: I'm a multidisciplinary professional who loves to study and apply what she learns in the development of cool things in a very creative way!
aboutDescriptionTwo: I work as Front-End Web Developer and I have professional and academic experience in Graphic Design and Mechanical Engineering. As a designer, I acquired empathy to understand and respect the client's vision, using my parameters and skills to deliver a final result in line with what was requested. In engineering, I dedicated myself to understanding long and complex development processes, always looking for the most effective and efficient way to solve any problem. Now, as a web developer, I can combine my skills in a more interesting and diverse way, creating web and mobile applications according to the required standards, in an optimized and personalized way.
contactSubtitle: Feel free to get in touch, ask questions, or just chat.
